Package io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.service.fluent

Class ModalServiceFluent<T extends UiServiceFluent<?>>

java.lang.Object
io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.service.fluent.ModalServiceFluent<T>
public class ModalServiceFluent<T extends UiServiceFluent<?>> extends Object
A fluent service class for interacting with modal UI elements in test automation.

Provides methods for clicking buttons within modals, retrieving modal details, and closing modals.

The generic type T represents the UI service fluent implementation that extends UiServiceFluent, allowing method chaining for seamless interaction.

Author:

      Constructs a new ModalServiceFluent instance.
      Parameters:
      uiServiceFluent - The parent fluent UI service instance.
      storage - The storage instance for storing validation results.
      modalService - The modal service responsible for interacting with modals.
      webDriver - The smart web driver used for interactions.

    • validateIsOpened

      public T validateIsOpened(ModalUiElement element, boolean soft)
      Validates that the specified modal UI element is opened, with the option to perform soft assertion.
      Parameters:
      element - The ModalUiElement representing the modal to validate.
      soft - If true, performs a soft assertion; otherwise, performs a hard assertion.
      Returns:
      The fluent UI service instance.
